## createASTAwareReporterDefinition() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates an AST-aware reporter definition.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createASTAwareReporterDefinition<TOptions extends ASTAwareReporterOptions = ASTAwareReporterOptions>(definition: Omit<ASTAwareReporterDefinition<TOptions>, 'supportsAST'>): ASTAwareReporterDefinition<TOptions>;
```

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>

definition


</td><td>

Omit&lt;[ASTAwareReporterDefinition](./change-detector-core.astawarereporterdefinition.md)<!-- -->&lt;TOptions&gt;, 'supportsAST'&gt;


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ASTAwareReporterDefinition](./change-detector-core.astawarereporterdefinition.md)<!-- -->&lt;TOptions&gt;

## Example


```ts
const myReporter = createASTAwareReporterDefinition({
  id: 'my-custom-reporter',
  name: 'My Custom Reporter',
  formats: ['text'],
  createReporter: (options) => ({
    formatAST: (report) => {
      // Custom formatting logic
      return `Changes: ${report.stats.total}`
    },
  }),
})
```
